text: Amazing southern food! The shrimp and grits were incredible. Service was top-notch and the atmosphere was perfect for a family dinner.
Great food and friendly staff. Portions were generous. Only complaint is that it was a bit crowded during peak hours.
Service was extremely slow. Waited 45 minutes for our food and it arrived cold. Very disappointed.
Best fried chicken I've ever had! The sides were delicious too. Highly recommend this place.
Food was okay. Nothing special but not bad either. Prices are reasonable for the portions.
